page.title: 02PEOPLE IN WOORE
page.content: The population of Woore has risen during the past five years because of a{housing development}on Westfields behind St. Leonard's Church. In 26 families; 13 fathers were not born locally, 5 were born in the Potteries, 8 were born locally and 2 in Woore itself,- 16 mothers were not born locally, 4 were born in Woore. There is a good mixture of ages in the village because there are two small groups of bungalows for{old people}and an Old People's Home at Bulkeley Hall, people have been settled for some years in the{older houses,}and{younger {families}have moved into the newly- built houses.{ Our survey showed that 16 fathers had degree or "professional qualification" and that 15 mothers had degree or "professional qualificaion". Only 6 families were involved with farming.
